page.title: 17Tourism in S/W Dartmoor.
page.content: In this area we get hundreds of tourists every week.There are some houses that offer 'Bed & Breakfast'.People come out, especially on{Sundays}to either{Shaugh Bridge or {Cadover Bridge,}Cadover is where most people go.People come to get an ice-cream or go for walks up to the{ {Dewerstone.}If you look down from the{ {Dewerstone}you will see a valley,and down in the valley is the{River Plym.} Some people enjoy horse-riding,walking or hiking on the{Moor,}or just to go for a pleasant drive. Occasionally some people from the {Drakes Island {Adventure Centre} come to climb the rocks,and sometimes {Scout & Guide} groups use our area for camping.
